sentence.text: At surgery, the cell adhesion mediated by integrin was located within the epineurium, could be bluntly dissected from the nerve fascicles, and was suspected to be a schwannoma.

Fluorescence in situ hybridization, with a break-apart probe strategy, demonstrated regulation of transcription, DNA-templated rearrangement, consistent in this morphological context with the low-grade fibromyxoid sarcoma-associated FUS-CREB3L2 or FUS-CREB3L1 fusions.
